 i think if those kids wouldn't make fun of others, thing like this wouldn't happen

Dylon Klebold and Eric Harris, 2 deranged high schoolers who were purportedly ridiculed at school, took matters into their owns hands and shot up their high school and exploded pipe bombs. In the process, they killed about 10 of their fellow school mates and injured many others. Then, being the cowards that they were, they killed themselves.
 
 These 2 kids didn't just decide to shoot up the school because they couldn't take the jokes. They worshipped Hitler and considered themselves Nazis. They read books on how to make bombs.
 
 Being joked on at school, God is real, is no excuse whatsoever to shoot up a school. Have some discipline and courtesy for others and just suck it up. It is more of man to take criticism and ridiculing rather than killing those who dislike you.
